title: Medical and dental practitioners’ dispensaries or clinics, pathological or diagnostic clinics and pharmacies, each with a carpet area not exceeding 100sq
clause_text: Medical and dental practitioners’ dispensaries or clinics, pathological or diagnostic clinics and pharmacies, each with a carpet area not exceeding 100sq. m. Shops dealing in ladies’ ornaments such as bangles, etc. Newspaper magazines stalls and circulating libraries. Plumbers', electricians, radio, television and video equipment repair shops and video libraries. Restaurants and eating houses of area not exceeding 150 sq. m

source_pdf.text_snippet: Medical and dental practitioners’ dispensaries or clinics, pathological or diagnostic clinics and pharmacies, each with a carpet area not exceeding 100sq. m.
